data.description: Here are some frequently asked questions about Minicraft+ and a few tips on how to resolve the problems.

qas.question: The game says I need Java
qas.answer: Download Java from www.java.com and install it to be able to run Minicraft+.

qas.question: How do I set up a Minicraft+ server?
I want to find out more information about Minicraft+.
qas.answer: Please see https://playminicraft.com for more info about the game.

qas.question: I'm still having problems launching the game.
qas.answer: If turning your PC off and on again doesn't fix it, please ask your question at ðŸ’¬|minicraft-chat, and hopefully a server member will be able to help you.
